org.ensor.robots.differentialdrive

Class DifferentialDriveBiote

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.ensor.threads.biote.Biote
      • org.ensor.robots.differentialdrive.DifferentialDriveBiote
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IGoalReachedListener

    public class DifferentialDriveBiote
extends Biote
implements IGoalReachedListener
    This method implements the differential drive command system. It allows an event to come in giving a desired velocity and bearing change together with a duration during which to make the angle change (radians per second). It uses an elementary forward kinematics model to estimate the desired velocity of each of the wheels.
    Author:
    jona
